content.text:
# List of programs broadcast by Discovery Kids (Latin America)

This is a list of television programs currently broadcast (in first-run or reruns), scheduled to be broadcast, or formerly broadcast on Discovery Kids, a Latin American cable television channel owned by Warner Bros. Discovery. The channel was launched on November 1, 1996, and airs a mix of animated and live-action programming. Programming may vary across feeds.
